S04n468:1: atha khalu bhagavataḥ purastāttataḥ pṛthivīpradeśāt parṣanmadhyāt saptaratnamayaḥ stūpo'bhyudgataḥ pañcayojanaśatānyuccaistvena tadanurūpeṇa ca pariṇāhena |
S04n468:2: abhyudgamya vaihāyasamantarīkṣe samavātiṣṭhaccitro darśanīyaḥ pañcabhiḥ puṣpagrahaṇīyavedikāsahasraiḥ svabhyalaṃkṛto bahutoraṇasahasraiḥ pratimaṇḍitaḥ patākāvaijayantīsahasrābhiḥ pralambito ratnadāmasahasrābhiḥ pralambitaḥ paṭṭaghaṇṭāsahasraiḥ pralambitaḥ tamālapatracandanagandhaṃ pramuñcamānaḥ |
S04n468:3: tena ca gandhena sarvāvatīyaṃ lokadhātuḥ saṃmūrcchitābhūt |
S04n468:5: tadyathā-suvarṇasya rūpyasya vaiḍūryasya musāragalvasyāśmagarbhasya lohitamukteḥ karketanasya |
S04n468:6: tasmiṃśca stūpe trāyastriṃśatkāyikā devaputrā divyairmāndāravamahāmāndāravaiḥ puṣpaistaṃ ratnastūpamavakiranti adhyavakiranti abhiprakiranti |
S04n468:7: tasmācca ratnastūpādevaṃrūpaḥ śabdo niścarati sma-sādhu sādhu bhagavan śākyamune |
S04n468:11: atha khalu tāścatasraḥ parṣadastaṃ mahāntaṃ ratnastūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā vaihāyasamantarīkṣe sthitaṃ saṃjātaharṣāḥ prītiprāmodyaprasādaprāptāḥ tasyāṃ velāyāmutthāya āsanebhyo'ñjaliṃ pragṛhyāvasthitāḥ ||
S04n468:12: atha khalu tasyāṃ velāyāṃ mahāpratibhāno nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokaṃ kautūhalaprāptaṃ viditvā bhagavantametadavocat-ko bhagavan hetuḥ,
S04n468:15: ko vā bhagavan asmānmahāratnastūpādevaṃrūpaṃ śabdaṃ niścārayati?
S04n468:16: evamukte bhagavān mahāpratibhānaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat-asmin mahāpratibhāna mahāratnastūpe tathāgatasyātmabhāvastiṣṭhati ekaghanaḥ |
S04n468:19: asti mahāpratibhāna adhastāyāṃ diśi asaṃkhyeyāni lokadhātukoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇyatikramya ratnaviśuddhā nāma lokadhātuḥ |
S04n468:21: tasyaitadbhagavataḥ purvapraṇidhānamabhūt-ahaṃ khalu pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ caramāṇo na tāvanniryāto'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S04n468:22: yāvanmayāyaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyo bodhisattvāvavādo na śruto'bhūt |
S04n468:23: yadā tu mayā ayaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyaḥ śrutaḥ,
S04n468:25: tena khalu punarmahāpratibhāna bhagavatā prabhūtaratnena tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena parinirvāṇakālasamaye sadevakasya lokasya samārakasya sabrahmakasya saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāḥ prajāyāḥ purastādevamārocitam-mama khalu bhikṣavaḥ parinirvṛtasya asya tathāgatātmabhāvavigrahasya eko mahāratnastūpaḥ kartavyaḥ |
S04n468:27: tasya khalu punarmahāpratibhāna bhagavataḥ prabhūtaratnasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyaitadadhiṣṭhānamabhūt-ayaṃ mama stūpo daśasu dikṣu sarvalokadhātuṣu yeṣu buddhakṣetreṣvayaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyaḥ saṃprakāśyeta,
S04n468:29: taistairbuddhairbhagavadbhirasmin saddharmapuṇḍarīke dharmaparyāye bhāṣyamāṇe parṣanmaṇḍalasyopari vaihāyasaṃ tiṣṭhet |
S04n468:30: teṣāṃ ca buddhānāṃ bhagavatāmimaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ bhāṣamāṇānāmayaṃ mamātmabhāvavigrahastūpaḥ sādhukāraṃ dadyāt |
S04n468:31: tadayaṃ mahāpratibhāna tasya bhagavataḥ prabhūtaratnasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya śarīrastūpaḥ |
S04n468:32: asyāṃ sahāyāṃ lokadhātau asmin saddharmapuṇḍarīke dharmaparyāye mayā bhāṣyamāṇe'smāt parṣanmaṇḍalamadhyādabhyudgamya uparyantarīkṣe vaihāyasaṃ sthitvā sādhukāraṃ dadāti sma ||
S04n468:33: atha khalu mahāpratibhāno bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat-paśyāma vayaṃ bhagavan etaṃ tathāgatavigrahaṃ bhagavato'nubhāvena |
S04n468:34: evamukte bhagavān mahāpratibhānaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat-tasya khalu punarmahāpratibhāna bhagavataḥ prabhūtaratnasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya praṇidhānaṃ gurukamabhūt |
S04n468:35: etadasya praṇidhānam-yadā khalvanyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu buddhā bhagavanta imaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ bhāṣeyuḥ,
S04n468:36: tadāyaṃ mamātmabhāvavigrahastūpo'sya saddharmapuṇḍarīkasya dharmaparyāyasya śravaṇāya gacchet tathāgatānāmantikam |
S04n468:37: yadā punaste buddhā bhagavanto mamātmabhāvavigrahamuddhāṭya darśayitukāmā bhaveyuścatasṛṇāṃ parṣadām,
S04n468:38: atha taistathāgatairdaśasu dikṣvanyonyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu ya ātmabhāvanirmitāstathāgatavigrahā anyānyanāmadheyāḥ,
S04n468:39: teṣu teṣu buddhakṣetreṣu sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayanti,
S04n468:40: tān sarvān saṃnipātya tairātmabhāvanirmitaistathāgatavigrahaiḥ sārdhaṃ paścādayaṃ mamātmabhāvavigrahastūpaḥ samuddhāṭya upadarśayitavyaścatasṛṇāṃ parṣadām |
S04n468:42: ye daśasu dikṣvanyonyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu lokadhātusahasreṣu sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayanti |
S04n468:44: atha khalu mahāpratibhāno bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat-tānapi tāvad bhagavaṃstathāgatātmabhāvāṃstathāgatanirmitān sarvān vandāmahai ||
S04n468:46: yayā raśmyā samanantarapramuktayā pūrvasyāṃ diśi pañcāśatsu gaṅgānadīvālukāsameṣu lokadhātukoṭīnayutaśatasahasreṣu ye buddhā bhagavanto viharanti sma,
S04n468:48: tāni ca buddhakṣetrāṇi sphaṭikamayāni saṃdṛśyante sma,
S04n468:51: teṣu teṣu buddhā bhagavanto madhureṇa valgunā svareṇa sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayamānāḥ saṃdṛśyante sma |
S04n468:52: bodhisattvaśatasahasraiśca paripūrṇāni tāni buddhakṣetrāṇi saṃdṛśyante sma |
S04n468:62: evaṃ samantāddaśasu dikṣu ekaikasyāṃ diśi bahūni gaṅgānadīvālukopamāni buddhakṣetrakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi bahuṣu gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātukoṭīnayutaśatasahasreṣu ye buddhā bhagavantastiṣṭhanti,
S04n468:64: atha khalu te daśasu dikṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ svān svān bodhisattvagaṇānāmantrayanti sma-gantavyaṃ khalu punaḥ kulaputrā bhaviṣyati asmābhiḥ sahāṃ lokadhātum,
S04n468:67: atha khalu te buddhā bhagavantaḥ svaiḥ svairupasthāyakaiḥ sārdhamātmadvitīyā ātmatṛtīyā imāṃ sahāṃ lokadhātumāgacchanti sma |
S04n468:68: iti hi tasmin samaye iyaṃ sarvāvatī lokadhātū ratnavṛkṣapratimaṇḍitābhūd vaiḍūryamayī saptaratnahemajālasaṃchannā mahāratnagandhadhūpanadhūpitā māndāravamahāmāndāravapuṣpasaṃstīrṇā kiṅkiṇījālālaṃkṛtā suvarṇasūtrāṣṭāpadanibaddhā apagatagrāmanagaranigamajanapadarāṣṭrarājadhānī apagatakālaparvatā apagatamucilindamahāmucilindaparvatā apagatacakravālamahācakravālaparvatā apagatasumeruparvatā apagatatadanyamahāparvatā apagatamahāsamudrā apagatanadīmahānadīparisaṃsthitābhūt,
S04n468:70: iti hi tasmin samaye ye'syāṃ sahāyāṃ lokadhātau ṣaḍgatyupapannāḥ sattvāḥ,
S04n468:72: sthāpayitvā ye tasyāṃ parṣadi saṃnipatitā abhūvan |
S04n468:73: atha khalu te buddhā bhagavanta upasthāyakadvitīyā upasthāyakatṛtīyā imāṃ sahāṃ lokadhātumāgacchanti sma |
S04n468:74: āgatāgatāśca te tathāgatā ratnavṛkṣamūle siṃhāsanamupaniśritya viharanti sma |
S04n468:76: ekaikasmiṃśca ratnavṛkṣamūle siṃhāsanaṃ prajñaptamabhūt pañcayojanaśatānyuccaistvena mahāratnapratimaṇḍitam |
S04n468:78: anena paryāyeṇa sarvasyāṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasrāyāṃ lokadhātau sarvaratnavṛkṣamūleṣu tathāgatāḥ paryaṅkaṃ baddhvā niṣaṇṇā abhūvan ||
S04n468:79: tena khalu punaḥ samayena iyaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasrī lokadhātustathāgataparipūrṇābhūt |
S04n468:80: na tāvad bhagavataḥ śākyamunestathāgatasyātmabhāvanirmitā ekasmādapi digbhāgāt sarva āgatā abhūvan |
S04n468:81: atha khalu punarbhagavān śākyamunistathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhasteṣāṃ tathāgatavigrahāṇāmāgatāgatānāmavakāśaṃ nirmimīte sma |
S04n468:82: samantādaṣṭabhyo digbhyo viṃśatibuddhakṣetrakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi sarvāṇi vaiḍūryamayāni saptaratnahemajālasaṃchannāni kiṅkiṇījālālaṃkṛtāni māndāravamahāmāndāravapuṣpasaṃstīrṇāni divyavitānavitatāni divyapuṣpadāmābhipralambitāni divyagandhadhūpanadhūpitāni |
S04n468:83: sarvāṇi ca tāni viṃśatibuddhakṣetrakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇyapagatagrāmanagaranigamajanapadarāṣṭrarājadhānīni apagatakālaparvatāni apagatamucilindamahāmucilindaparvatāni apagatacakravālamahācakravālaparvatāni apagatasumeruparvatāni apagatatadanyamahāparvatāni apagatamahāsamudrāṇi apagatanadīmahānadīni parisaṃsthāpayati apagatadevamanuṣyāsurakāyāni apagatanirayatiryagyoniyamalokāni |
S04n468:84: tāni ca sarvāṇi bahubuddhakṣetrāṇi ekameva buddhakṣetramekameva pṛthivīpradeśaṃ parisaṃsthāpayāmāsa samaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ saptaratnamayaiśca vṛkṣaiścitritam |
S04n468:86: sarvasmiṃśca ratnavṛkṣamūle pañcayojanaśatānyārohapariṇāhaṃ divyaratnamayaṃ vicitraṃ darśanīyaṃ siṃhāsanaṃ prajñaptamabhūt |
S04n468:87: teṣu ratnavṛkṣamūleṣvāgatāgatāstathāgatāḥ siṃhāsaneṣu paryaṅkaṃ baddhvā niṣīdante sma |
S04n468:88: anena paryāyeṇa punaraparāṇi viṃśatilokadhātukoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇyekaikasyāṃ diśi śākyamunistathāgataḥ pariśodhayati sma teṣāṃ tathāgatānāmāgatānāmavakāśārtham |
S04n468:89: tānyapi viṃśatilokadhātukoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇyaikaikasyāṃ diśi apagatagrāmanagaranigamajanapadarāṣṭrarājadhānīni apagatakālaparvatāni apagatamucilindamahāmucilindaparvatāni apagatacakravālamahācakravālaparvatāni apagatasumeruparvatāni apagatatadanyamahāparvatāni apagatamahāsamudrāṇi apagatanadīmahānadīni parisaṃsthāpayati apagatadevamanuṣyāsurakāyāni apagatanirayatiryagyoniyamalokāni |
S04n468:91: tānyapi buddhakṣetrāṇi vaiḍūryamayāni saptaratnahemajālapraticchannāni kiṅkiṇījālālaṃkṛtāni māndāravamahāmāndāravapuṣpasaṃstīrṇāni divyavitānavitatāni divyapuṣpadāmābhipralambitāni divyagandhadhūpanadhūpitāni ratnavṛkṣopaśobhitāni |
S04n468:94: tataste tathāgatā niṣīdante sma pṛthak pṛthak siṃhāsaneṣu ratnavṛkṣamūleṣu paryaṅkaṃ baddhvā ||
S04n468:95: tena khalu punaḥ samayena bhagavatā śākyamuninā ye nirmitāstathāgatāḥ pūrvasyāṃ diśi sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayanti sma gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu buddhakṣetrakoṭīnayutaśatasahasreṣu,
S04n468:97: te cāgatā aṣṭāsu dikṣu niṣaṇṇā abhūvan |
S04n468:98: tena khalu punaḥ samayenaikaikasyāṃ diśi triṃśallokadhātukoṭīśatasahasrāṇyaṣṭabhyo digbhyaḥ samantāttaistathāgatairākrāntā abhūvan |
S04n468:99: atha khalu te tathāgatāḥ sveṣu sveṣu siṃhāsaneṣūpaviṣṭāḥ svān svānupasthāyakān saṃpreṣayanti sma bhagavataḥ śākyamunerantikam |
S04n468:100: ratnapuṣpapuṭān datvā evaṃ vadanti sma-gacchata yūyaṃ gṛdhrakūṭaṃ parvatam |
S04n468:101: gatvā ca punastasmiṃstaṃ bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ vanditvā asmadvacanādalpābādhatāṃ mandaglānatāṃ ca balaṃ ca sparśavihāratāṃ ca paripṛcchadhvaṃ sārdhaṃ bodhisattvagaṇena śrāvakagaṇena |
S04n468:103: evaṃ ca vadadhvam-dadāti khalu punarbhagavāṃstathāgataśchandamasya mahāratnastūpasya samuddhāṭane |
S04n468:104: evaṃ te tathāgatāḥ sarve svān svānupasthāyakān saṃpreṣayāmāsuḥ ||
S04n468:105: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamunistathāgatastasyāṃ velāyāṃ svānnirmitānaśeṣataḥ samāgatān viditvā,
S04n468:110: tāśca sarvāścatasraḥ pariṣadaḥ utthāyāsanebhyo'ñjalīḥ parigṛhya bhagavato mukhamullokayantyastasthuḥ |
S04n468:111: atha khalu bhagavāṃstaṃ mahāntaṃ ratnastūpaṃ vaihāyasaṃ sthitaṃ dakṣiṇayā hastāṅgulyā madhye samuddhāṭayati sma |
S04n468:112: samuddhāṭya ca dve bhittī pravisārayati sma |
S04n468:114: evameva bhagavāṃstaṃ mahāntaṃ ratnastūpaṃ vaihāyasaṃ sthitaṃ dakṣiṇayā hastāṅgulyā madhye samuddhāṭya apāvṛṇoti sma |
S04n468:116: atha khalu bhagavān prabhūtaratnastathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ siṃhāsanopaviṣṭaḥ paryaṅkaṃ baddvā pariśuṣkagātraḥ saṃghaṭitakāyo yathā samādhisamāpannastathā saṃdṛśyate sma |
S04n468:117: evaṃ ca vācamabhāṣata-sādhu sādhu bhagavan śākyamune |
S04n468:119: sādhu khalu punastvaṃ bhagavan śākyamune yastvamimaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ parṣanmadhye bhāṣase |
S04n468:121: atha khalu tāścatasraḥ parṣadastaṃ bhagavantaṃ prabhūtaratnaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ bahukalpakoṭīnayutaśatasahasraparinirvṛtaṃ tathā bhāṣamāṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā āścaryaprāptā adbhutaprāptā abhūvan |
S04n468:122: tasyāṃ velāyāṃ taṃ bhagavantaṃ prabhūtaratnaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddha taṃ ca bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ divyamānuṣyakai ratnarāśibhirabhyavakiranti sma |
S04n468:123: atha khalu bhagavān prabhūtaratnastathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho bhagavataḥ śākyamunestathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya tasminneva siṃhāsane'rdhāsanamadāsīt,
S04n468:125: evaṃ ca vadati-ihaiva bhagavān śākyamunistathāgato niṣīdatu |
S04n468:126: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamunistathāgatastasminnardhāsane niṣasāda tenaiva tathāgatena sārdham |
S04n468:127: ubhau ca tau tathāgatau tasya mahāratnastūpasya madhye siṃhāsanopaviṣṭau vaihāyasamantarīkṣasthau saṃdṛśyete ||
S04n468:128: atha khalu tāsāṃ catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāmetadabhavat-dūrasthā vayamābhyāṃ tathāgatābhyām |
S04n468:130: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamunistathāgatastāsāṃ catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya tasyāṃ velāyāmṛddhibalena tāścatasraḥ parṣado vaihāyasamuparyantarīkṣe pratiṣṭhāpayati sma |
S04n468:131: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamunistathāgatastasyāṃ velāyāṃ tāścatasraḥ parṣada āmantrayate sma-ko bhikṣavo yuṣmākamutsahate tasyāṃ sahāyāṃ lokadhātau imaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ saṃprakāśayitum?
S04n468:136: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata—
S04n468:173: mayi nirvṛte yo etaṃ dharmaparyāyu dhārayet |
S04n468:176: siṃhanādaṃ śruṇe tasya vyavasāyaṃ karoti yaḥ ||11 ||
S04n468:181: ahaṃ ca tena bhavi pūjitaḥ sadā
S04n468:201: bhavāgre yaśca tiṣṭhitvā dharmaṃ bhāṣennaro iha |
S04n468:204: ya idaṃ dhārayet sūtraṃ bhāṣedvā tatsuduṣkaram ||21 ||
S04n468:206: prakṣipitvā ca gaccheta na tadbhavati duṣkaram ||22 ||
S04n468:209: pṛthivīdhātuṃ ca yaḥ sarvaṃ nakhāgre saṃpraveśayet |
S04n468:210: prakṣipitvā ca gaccheta brahmalokaṃ pi āruhet ||24 ||
S04n468:211: na duṣkaraṃ hi so kuryānna ca vīryasya tattakam |
S04n468:214: paścātkāle idaṃ sūtraṃ vadeyā yo muhūrtakam ||26 ||
S04n468:215: na duṣkaramidaṃ loke kalpadāhasmi yo naraḥ |
S04n468:221: na hyetaṃ duṣkaraṃ bhoti tasmin kālasmi bhikṣuṇām |
S04n468:223: tasyedaṃ duṣkarataraṃ idaṃ sūtraṃ ca dhārayet |
S04n468:227: ato bahutaraṃ karma karoti sa narottamaḥ |
S04n468:228: nirvṛtasya hi yo mahyaṃ sūtraṃ dhārayate varam ||33 ||
S04n468:232: dhāreti yo idaṃ sūtraṃ sa dhāre jinavigraham ||35 ||
S04n468:234: ya utsahati vaḥ kaścit paścātkālasmi dhāraṇam ||36 ||
S04n468:244: paścime kāli yo bhāṣet sūtramekaṃ muhūrtakam ||41 ||
S04n468:245: atha khalu bhagavān kṛtsnaṃ bodhisattvagaṇaṃ sasurāsuraṃ ca lokamāmantraya etadavocat-bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo'tīte'dhvani ahamaprameyāsaṃkhyeyān kalpān saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ sūtraṃ paryeṣitavānakhinno'viśrāntaḥ |
S04n468:246: pūrvaṃ ca ahamanekān kalpānanekāni kalpaśatasahasrāṇi rājābhūvamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau kṛtapraṇidhānaḥ |
S04n468:252: tena ca samayena ayaṃ loko dīrghāyurabhat |
S04n468:253: anekavarṣaśatasahasrajīvitena ca ahaṃ kālena dharmārthaṃ rājyaṃ kāritavān,
S04n468:255: so'haṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ kumāraṃ rājye'bhiṣicya caturdiśaṃ jyeṣṭhadharmagaveṣaṇāya udyukto'bhūvam |
S04n468:256: evaṃ ghaṇṭayā ghoṣāpayitavān-yo me jyeṣṭhaṃ dharmamanupradāsyati,
S04n468:260: sa māmetadavocat-asti mahārāja saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ nāma sutraṃ jyeṣṭhadharmanirdeśakam |
S04n468:263: so'haṃ śrutvā tasyarṣervacanaṃ hṛṣṭastuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ prītisaumanasyajāto yena sa ṛṣistenopeyivān |
S04n468:267: divasaṃ caivaṃvidhaṃ karma kṛtvā rātrau śayānasya mañcake pādān dhārayāmi |
S04n468:268: na ca me kāyaklamo na cetasi klamo'bhūt |
S04n468:269: evaṃ ca me kurvataḥ paripūrṇaṃ varṣāsahasraṃ gatam ||
S04n468:270: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmetamevārthaṃ paridyotayannimā gāthā abhāṣata—
S04n468:291: tatkiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavaḥ anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena rājābhūt?
S04n468:294: ahaṃ sa tena kālena tena samayena rājābhūvam |
S04n468:295: syātkhalu punarbhikṣavo'nyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayenarṣirabhūt?
S04n468:297: ayameva sa tena kālena tena samayena devadatto bhikṣurṛṣirabhut |
S04n468:299: devadattameva cāgamya mayā ṣaṭū pāramitāḥ paripūritāḥ,
S04n468:301: dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāni aśītyanuvyañjanāni suvarṇavarṇacchavitā daśa balāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catvāri saṃgrahavastūni aṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmā maharddhibalatā daśadiksattvanistāraṇatā,
S04n468:304: prativedayāmi- eṣa devadatto bhikṣuranāgate'dhvani aprameyaiḥ kalpairasaṃkhyeyairdevarājo nāma tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho bhaviṣyati vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca bhagavān devasopānāyāṃ lokadhātau |
S04n468:311: devarājasya khalu punarbhikṣavastathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya viṃśatyantarakalpān saddharmaḥ sthāsyati |
S04n468:313: ekaghanaṃ cāsya śarīraṃ bhaviṣyati saptaratnastūpaṃ praviṣṭam |
S04n468:316: sarve ca tatra devamanuṣyāḥ pūjāṃ kariṣyanti puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākābhirgāthābhiḥ |
S04n468:318: ye ca taṃ stūpaṃ pradakṣiṇaṃ kariṣyanti praṇāmaṃ vā,
S04n468:319: teṣāṃ kecidagraphalamarhattvaṃ sākṣātkariṣyanti kecit pratyekabodhimanuprāpsyante acintyācāścāprameyā devamanuṣyā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittānyutpādya avinivartanīyā bhaviṣyanti ||
S04n468:320: atha khalu bhagavān punareva bhikṣusaṃghamāmantrayate sma-yaḥ kaścit bhikṣavo'nāgate'dhvani kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ sūtraparivartaṃ śroṣyati,
S04n468:321: śrutvā ca na kāṅkṣiṣyati na vicikitsiṣyati,
S04n468:323: tena tisṛṇāṃ durgatīnāṃ dvāraṃ pithitaṃ bhaviṣyati narakatiryagyoniyamalokopapattiṣu na patiṣyati |
S04n468:327: tasminnaupapāduke saptaratnamaye padme upapatsyate tathāgatasya saṃmukham ||
S04n468:328: atha khalu tasyāṃ velāyāmadhastāddiśaḥ prabhūtaratnasya tathāgatasya buddhakṣetrādāgataḥ prajñākūṭo nāma bodhisattvaḥ |
S04n468:329: sa taṃ prabhūtaratnaṃ tathāgatametadavocat-gacchāmo bhagavan svakaṃ buddhakṣetram |
S04n468:330: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamunistathāgataḥ prajñākūṭaṃ bodhisattvametadavocat-muhūrtaṃ tāvat kulaputra āgamayasva yāvanmadīyena bodhisattvena mañjuśriyā kumārabhūtena sārdhaṃ kaṃcideva dharmaviniścayaṃ kṛtvā paścāt svakaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ gamiṣyasi |
S04n468:331: atha khalu tasyāṃ velāyāṃ mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtaḥ sahasrapatre padme śakaṭacakrapramāṇamātre niṣaṇṇo'nekabodhisattvaparivṛtaḥ puraskṛtaḥ samudramadhyāt sāgaranāgarājabhavanādabhyudgamya upari vaihāyasaṃ khagapathena gṛdhrakūṭe parvate bhagavato'ntikamupasaṃkrāntaḥ |
S04n468:332: atha mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtaḥ padmādavatīrya bhagavataḥ śākyamuneḥ prabhūtaratnasya ca tathāgatasya pādau śirasābhivanditvā yena prajñākūṭo bodhisattvastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ |
S04n468:333: upasaṃkramya prajñākūṭena bodhisattvena sārdhaṃ saṃmukhaṃ saṃmodanīṃ saṃrañjanīṃ vividhāṃ kathāmupasaṃgṛhya ekānte nyaṣīdat |
S04n468:334: atha khalu prajñākūṭo bodhisattvo mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat-samudramadhyagatena tvayā mañjuśrīḥ kiyān sattvadhāturvinītaḥ?
S04n468:336: tāvadaprameyāṇyasaṃkhyeyāni yāvadvācā na śakyaṃ vijñāpayituṃ cittena vā cintayitum |
S04n468:337: muhūrtaṃ tāvat kulaputra āgamayasva yāvat pūrvanimittaṃ drakṣyasi |
S04n468:339: tasyāṃ velāyāmanekāni padmasahasrāṇi samudramadhyādabhyudgatāni upari vaihāyasam |
S04n468:341: atha te bodhisattvāstenaiva khagapathena yena gṛdhrakūṭaḥ parvatastenopasaṃkrāntāḥ |
S04n468:342: upasaṃkramya tataścopari vaihāyasaṃ sthitāḥ saṃdṛśyante sma |
S04n468:343: sarve ca te mañjuśriyā kumārabhūtena vinītā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau |
S04n468:347: sarve ca te sarvadharmān śūnyāniti saṃjānanti sma,
S04n468:349: atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtaḥ prajñākūṭaṃ bodhisattvametadavocat-sarvo'yaṃ kulaputra mayā samudramadhyagatena sattvavinayaḥ kṛtaḥ |
S04n468:351: atha khalu prajñākūṭo bodhisattvo mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtaṃ gāthābhigītena paripṛcchati—
S04n468:360: mañjuśrīrāha-samudramadhye saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ sūtraṃ bhāṣitavān, na cānyat |
S04n468:361: prajñākūṭa āha-idaṃ sūtraṃ gambhīraṃ sūkṣmaṃ durdṛśam,
S04n468:362: na cānena sutreṇa kiṃcidanyat sūtraṃ samamasti |
S04n468:363: asti kaścit sattvo ya idaṃ sūtraratnaṃ satkuryādavaboddhumanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhum?
S04n468:364: mañjuśrīrāha-asti kulaputra sāgarasya nāgarājño duhitā aṣṭavarṣā jātyā mahāprajñā tīkṣṇendriyā jñānapūrvaṃgamena kāyavāṅmanaskarmaṇā samanvāgatā sarvatathāgatabhāṣitavyañjanārthodgrahaṇe dhāraṇīpratilabdhā sarvadharmasattvasamādhānasamādhisahasraikakṣaṇapratilābhinī |
S04n468:365: bodhicittāvinivartinī vistīrṇapraṇidhānā sarvasattveṣvātmapremānugatā guṇotpādane ca samarthā |
S04n468:367: smitamukhī paramayā śubhavarṇapuṣkalatayā samanvāgatā maitracittā karuṇāṃ ca vācaṃ bhāṣate |
S04n468:369: prajñākūṭo bodhisattva āha-dṛṣṭo mayā bhagavān śākyamunistathāgato bodhāya ghaṭamāno bodhisattvabhūto'nekāni puṇyāni kṛtavān |
S04n468:370: anekāni ca kalpasahasrāṇi na kadācid vīryaṃ sraṃsitavān |
S04n468:371: trisāhasramahāsāhasrāyāṃ lokadhātau nāsti kaścidantaśaḥ sarṣapamātro'pi pṛthivīpradeśaḥ yatrānena śarīraṃ na nikṣiptaṃ sattvahitahetoḥ |
S04n468:375: atha khalu tasyāṃ velāyāṃ sāgaranāgarājaduhitā agrataḥ sthitā saṃdṛśyate sma |
S04n468:378: puṇyaṃ puṇyaṃ gabhīraṃ ca diśaḥ sphurati sarvaśaḥ |
S04n468:382: yathecchayā me saṃbodhiḥ sākṣī me'tra tathāgataḥ |
S04n468:384: atha khalu tasyāṃ velāyāmāyuṣmān śāriputrastāṃ sāgaranāgarājaduhitarametadavocat-kevalaṃ kulaputri bodhāya cittamutpannam |
S04n468:387: asti kulaputri strī na ca vīryaṃ sraṃsayati,
S04n468:388: anekāni ca kalpaśatānyanekāni ca kalpasahasrāṇi puṇyāni karoti,
S04n468:392: pañca sthānāni strī adyāpi na prāpnoti |
S04n468:394: prathamaṃ brahmasthānaṃ dvitīyaṃ śakrasthānaṃ tṛtīyaṃ mahārājasthānaṃ caturthaṃ cakravartisthānaṃ pañcamamavaivartikabodhisattvasthānam ||
S04n468:395: atha khalu tasyāṃ velāyāṃ sāgaranāgarājaduhitureko maṇirasti,
S04n468:396: yaḥ kṛtsnāṃ mahāsāhasrāṃ lokadhātuṃ mūlyaṃ kṣamate |
S04n468:397: sa ca maṇistayā sāgaranāgarājaduhitrā bhagavate dattaḥ |
S04n468:399: atha sāgaranāgarājaduhitā prajñākūṭaṃ bodhisattvaṃ sthaviraṃ ca śāriputrametadavocat-yo'yaṃ maṇirmayā bhagavato dattaḥ,
S04n468:400: sa ca bhagavatā śīrghraṃ pratigṛhīto veti?
S04n468:401: sthavira āha-tvayā ca śīghraṃ datto bhagavatā ca śīghraṃ pratigṛhītaḥ |
S04n468:402: sāgaranāgarājaduhitā āha-yadyahaṃ bhadanta śāriputra maharddhikī syām,
S04n468:405: atha tasyāṃ velāyāṃ sāgaranāgarājaduhitā sarvalokapratyakṣaṃ sthavirasya ca śāriputrasya pratyakṣaṃ tat strīndriyamantarhitaṃ puruṣendriyaṃ ca prādurbhūtaṃ bodhisattvabhūtaṃ cātmānaṃ saṃdarśayati |
S04n468:407: atha dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi vimalā nāma lokadhātuḥ |
S04n468:408: tatra saptaratnamaye bodhivṛkṣamūle niṣaṇṇamabhisaṃbuddhamātmānaṃ saṃdarśayati sma,
S04n468:409: dvātriṃśallakṣaṇadharaṃ sarvānuvyajanarūpaṃ prabhayā ca daśadiśaṃ sphuritvā dharmadeśanāṃ kurvāṇam |
S04n468:411: te sarve taṃ tathāgataṃ paśyanti sma,
S04n468:413: ye ca sattvāstasya tathāgatasya dharmadeśanāṃ śṛṇvanti,
S04n468:416: iyaṃ ca sahā lokadhātuḥ ṣaḍvikāraṃ prākampat |
S04n468:419: atha prajñākūṭo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sthaviraśca śāriputrastūṣṇīmabhūtām ||
